Text: If i remember correctly, back in the days when TPB first had this game, some years ago that is. People had major issues with cracking it and run it, however... this can easly be solved nowdays by just downloading the latest patch for the game as it removes the copyprotection. Enjoy, it really is a great game, brought me hundreds of good fun gaminghours. I also reccomend you downloading the mod "Cinema Soundmod" as it changes lots of the voicecasting in the game (germans speak german, more and better music and so on)
